column2: "Do you know the Kuklonahda Darkers from the Ruins? They're absolutely huge."
"They have a wide attack range, and when they hit the ground, it sends out shockwaves. To be honest, I'm having a hard time dealing with them."
"If I could take them out quickly with a Just Attack, that would solve my problem, but figuring out how to do that isn't going well."
"I'm sorry for taking up so much of your time, senpai, but could you show me how to beat them with a Just Attack?"
